[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/context](./context.md) &gt; [TypeNamespaceMapping](./context.typenamespacemapping.md)

## TypeNamespaceMapping type

Mapping artifact types to binding key namespaces (prefixes).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TypeNamespaceMapping = {
    [name: string]: string;
};
```

## Example


```ts
{
  repository: 'repositories'
}
```
